title: ►9/1 ►Priv Suite Inc Solarium ►JACUZZIS ►Gourmet Kit►W&D►NO FEE
posting_body: Summary:
•	First Floor of a Gingerbread Victorian house.
•	Available  9/1/22
•	1 Year Minimum Lease
•	$990 for two Private rooms.
•	Utilities additional Flat $150 / Mo year round and covers, Heat, Electric, Gas, Hot water, hi speed wi-fi.
•	Rent including  all Utilities   $ 1140
Description:
•	Bedroom Downstairs
•	Private “Living room Solarium” Upstairs.
It has two walls of glass, oak floors, and is sort of “loft space” with Loft bed and wash basin in the corner.
Eclectic space for a minimalist who likes light.
•	Private staircase between rooms
•	Private Entrance from outside.
•	Semi Private Bath with marble and Jacuzzi / Shower
•	Free Laundry next to bath.
•	Kitchen is shared with 20’s/30’s professionals
•	Private outdoor entrance from back yard.
•	The bathroom adjacent and convenient to your suite is not usually used by the other tenants, so is almost private.
(Green Marble Bath in the photos).
•	Free Laundry next to the bathroom.
•	Bedroom is down stairs, and shown with bed, but many people use it as an office space.
It has tile floors.
•	Utilities included = Heating, Electricity hot water, Washer Dryer & Dishwasher.
High Speed  wi-fi,   included as a gratuity
Location:
•	Safe, quiet residential neighborhood.
•	Walk or ride to  MIT, Harvard and BU Bridge, Longwood or MGH Hospitals, bus on corner to Longwood.
•	Two Italian eateries and convenient food mart: one block
•	Walk to Whole Foods
•	Edge of MIT Campus, two blocks
•	4 Block walk to BU Campus
•	5 min bike ride to Harvard Campus
•	3 blocks to “Magazine Beach Park”, offering sailing, windsurfing, paddle boarding and rowing on the Charles.
•	Two acre Fulmore park abuts the back yard with trees, gardens, grass and benches.
•	The Hyatt Swimming Pool and health club are a five minute walk.
•	Commonwealth Ave.
Green line: five minute walk.
•	Central Square Red line: 10 minute walk
•	Cambridge cross town # 47 bus to Longwood Medical etc, stops at the nearest corner
Shared Kitchen
•	Huge Kitchen 13x25 feet
•	Quadruple stainless kitchen sinks,
•	TWO huge 24 cubic foot side by side refrigerators
•	5 burner Commercial Style Stainless Gas stove (new since pictures)
•	Dishwasher
•	lots of cabinets and counters
•	Tile floors
House Mates
•	4 professional men in their 20’s and thirties share the kitchen.
Not much cooking or competition ?
•	I call it the “United Nation of Winners”.
•	We have a Chinese Bank Fraud analyst, an Armenian MIT PHD, a Guatemalan Concierge and I guess that makes Sean our Token White Boy Security Manger and me the non-resident Honky.
We didn’t plan it that way.
BUT bring your easy going personality and sense of humor if you want to be happy in this house (or this world).
•	We “Judge people by the content of their character” ONLY !
Quoting from Late Great Reverend Martin Luther King Jr.
•	That’s what we got.
•	Tell us about yourself, and how your interesting life will fit in.
Captain Rodney Wishing you good health, happiness,
Fair Winds and Following Seas
